title: Mac bugsplat after champ select ??
body: My mac keeps on bugsplatting after champion select. I get to champ select and choose my champ w/ no problem but as soon as the game goes into loading screen, the screen will turn white for a short time and then go to a bugsplat. Any ideas how to fix it? My mac is virus/malware free.

replies.body:
Bugsplats typically indicate there's either an issue with your SMC, NVRAM, or with your hardware. I strongly recommend working through our [**Bugsplat & Crash Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#section-mac) to address the common solutions for this issue on Mac.

Let me know if this resolved your issue.
It resolved nothing. I've tried everything. help
I am having the same problem. I did everything with the bugsplat and crash guide and nothing has helped. It's only started doing this for a few days now. Nothing I do fixes it.
Have you figured out a solution??
I am having the exact same problem, please help!!
Have you figured out a solution??

Hey, I THINK SO! Essentially, my understanding from what the Riot Expert said was, Curse (the voice app) is causing a bug splat at the moment. They don't know why its happening, as it hadn't been an issue in the past, but they suggest you uninstall it. 

I haven't tested this solution extensively yet, however it honestly perfectly lines up with my experience since its fine when I play by myself, but it crashes when I duo with friends and use Curse. 

They also said that if that doesn't help, then run the Hextech Repair Tool, open a ticket, and attach the logs from the repair tool. Let me know if works for you!

Im having the exact same issues.... I log into league and join a draft game, no problem.... pick champions, no problem. as soon as the loading screen or screen where it shows the teams champions pop up, it crashes and I get a BugSplat error. Ive done everything possible, including the suggestions listed below, googled other solutions. nothing has helped :( its been a week now and I still can't play. I am on a iMac. PLEASE HELP :'(
